## IBubble interface

A bubble interface.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IBubble extends IDraggable, IContextMenu, IFocusableNode 
```
**Extends:** [IDraggable](./blockly.idraggable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IContextMenu](./blockly.icontextmenu_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.ibubble_interface.dispose_1_methodsignature.md) | Dispose of this bubble. |
|  [getRelativeToSurfaceXY()](./blockly.ibubble_interface.getrelativetosurfacexy_1_methodsignature.md) | Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this bubble's body relative to the drawing surface's origin (0,0), in workspace units. |
|  [getSvgRoot()](./blockly.ibubble_interface.getsvgroot_1_methodsignature.md) | Return the root node of the bubble's SVG group. |

|  [moveTo(x, y)](./blockly.ibubble_interface.moveto_1_methodsignature.md) | Move the bubble to the specified location in workspace coordinates. |
|  [setDeleteStyle(enable)](./blockly.ibubble_interface.setdeletestyle_1_methodsignature.md) | Update the style of this bubble when it is dragged over a delete area. |
|  [setDragging(dragging)](./blockly.ibubble_interface.setdragging_1_methodsignature.md) | Sets whether or not this bubble is being dragged. |
